record.jsxtip: Fires after the user double-clicks on this series.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the index of the selected CDF record.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user selects this series.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the index of the selected CDF record.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user hovers the mouse over this series and before the spyglass displays. The event script must evaluate to the HTML content to display in the spyglass. Canceling this event prevents the spyglass from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.
the index of the selected CDF record.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record.

record.jsxtip: Fires after the user right-clicks this series and before the bound context menu displays. Canceling this event prevents the menu from displaying.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu.

record.jsxtext: the index of the selected CDF record.
the CDF jsxid of the selected record.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this series is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this series before it is removed from the DOM.
